articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Weak current Apparatus Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Weak current Apparatus Factory
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-the-spot guidance to the Kangdong Weak current Apparatus Factory wonderfully renewed to meet the requirement of the era of Songun.
					 After being briefed on the factory before a map showing its panoramic view, he went round the interior and exterior of the factory rebuilt on a modern basis for hours to learn in detail about its technical updating and production.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied with the fact that its workers have successfully put the production processes on such modern and scientific basis as the CNC technology to make radical progress in production of light electrical apparatuses. This is a striking demonstration of the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of holding on to science and technology as lifeline in building an economic power, he said.
					
					 Saying that the advantages and vitality of the independent national economy of the DPRK can be displayed more strikingly on a full scale when the Juche character of the economy is steadily intensified while realizing the modernization and scientification based on the latest science and technology like the said factory, he highly appreciated the revolutionary working spirit and aggressive working attitude of its workers.
					
					 The quality of various building parts and daily necessities the factory has produced by making good use of by-products is very high, he said, praising its employees' spirit of serving the people.
					
					 Then he made rounds of a cultural house, a dining hall and other cultural and welfare service facilities built in peculiar style by the factory. The factory is reminiscent of a rest center, he said, highly estimating its officials for having provided the workers with the good living conditions.
					
					 He urged all the units to zealously follow the good example of the factory, saying that it is a model in all aspects including the work for putting production processes on a modern and scientific basis and establishing the cultured ways in production and life and the welfare service for the employees.
					
					 The credit for the shining successes achieved by the factory in recent years goes to its officials who have conducted overall business administration such as production, technical updating and welfare service on a scientific and profitable basis in line with the principles of Korean-style socialist economic management, he said, stressing that it is of weighty significance in accelerating the advance of great surge for the officials to carefully map out the economic operation and management on a scientific basis.
					
					 He advanced the highly important tasks to be fulfilled by the factory and expressed great expectation and conviction that the officials and workers of the factory would creditably play the role of the vanguard and shock brigade in implementing the economic policy of the WPK in the future, too.

articles.title: Workers Called upon to Successes in Light Industry and Agriculture
articles.content:
Workers Called upon to Successes in Light Industry and Agriculture
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The employees of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex on Saturday sent a letter to all other working people across the country calling on them to make redoubled efforts and leap forward full of confidence and optimism in order to proudly signal victory in the light industrial and agricultural fronts.
					 The letter noted that the goal of the general offensive is clear and the campaign in 2010 is sure to be crowned with victory, stressing the need to bring about an unprecedented leap forward and a dramatic turn in improving the people's standard of living without fail and thus realize the noble intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to enable them to lead an affluent life as early as possible and show the whole world that what the Workers' Party of Korea determined is not an empty talk.
					
					 The letter went on:
					
					It was the lifelong wish of President Kim Il Sung to enable the Korean people to enjoy greatest happiness in the socialist land of bliss with nothing to desire more. And it is the ardent desire of
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Our tasks are vast but we have a treasured sword for emerging victors again. Happiness is sure to come as long as Kim Jong Il steers the on-going historic general offensive and the people trust and follow him only.
					
					 Last year was a year of change and a phenomenal year of realizing all the ideals of the people as intended by Kim Jong Il. And this year, too, will shine as a year of a radical turn in the people's standard of living and a year shouting louder hurray of socialism as determined by him.

articles.title: First Day of Sports Observed
articles.content:
First Day of Sports Observed
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- A group running was held Sunday by officials of ministries and national institutions on the first day of sports this year.
					 They left Kim Il Sung Square and ran through streets of the city shouting slogans "human bombs", "devoted defence" and so on despite the cold of the mid-winter, encouraged by loudspeaker vans' dynamic agitation and the songs played by them in their van. 
					
					 The event stirred up the atmosphere of the capital alive with the drive for effecting a great surge. 
					
					 Similar sport events took place in provinces, cities and counties of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Czech Organizations
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Czech Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Jan. 4 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the leading newspapers of the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that great successes were achieved in all fields in the DPRK last year under the guidance of supreme General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, the success made in the second underground nuclear test, the perfection of the Juche-based steel-making system, the attainment of the cutting edge of the CNC technology and the firework displays on the Day of the Sun--birthday of President Kim Il Sung--, May Day and the anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, etc. represented the reality of the DPRK dashing ahead towards a thriving socialist nation, it said, adding:
					
					 The main task set forth in the editorial is to dynamically wage an all-Party, nationwide general offensive for the improvement of the people's standard of living on the basis of the laudable victory and success made in the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the Korean people would implement the tasks set forth in the joint editorial without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day of Observed in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day of Observed in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo sponsored a lecture on Dec. 29 last year on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the party, said in the lecture that
						 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 At the end of the last century the world progressives were deeply concerned about the destiny of socialist Korea as socialism collapsed in the Soviet Union and the eastern European countries, President Kim Il Sung demised and it was hit by natural disasters for consecutive years and the imperialist allied forces became undisguised in their moves to stifle it.
					
					 It was against this background that Kim Jong Il held aloft the banner of Songun and led the "Arduous March" to victory, thus bringing about a landmark phase in turning the DPRK into a thriving nation.
					
					 The KPA has registered world-startling successes in the defence of the country and the socialist construction as a main force for the revolution and the Korean people have firmly defended the socialist fortress of Juche closely rallied as one around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating as an ideological and military power which no formidable force dares provoke.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as an invincible treasured sword for protecting the sovereignty of the country and achieving the prosperity of the nation as it is a great political mode to be followed by the developing countries.
